   35: %% External exports
   36: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------

   38: -export([

   40: 	 init_per_suite/1,    end_per_suite/1, 
   41: 	 init_per_group/2,    end_per_group/2, 
   42: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2, 
   43: 	 
   44: 	 
   45: 	 simple_register_and_unregister1/1,
   46: 	 simple_register_and_unregister2/1,
   47: 	 simple_register_and_unregister3/1,
   48: 	 register_and_crash1/1,
   49: 	 register_and_crash2/1,
   50: 	 register_and_crash3/1,
   51: 	 register_request_and_crash1/1,
   52: 	 register_request_and_crash2/1,
   53: 	 register_request_and_crash3/1,
   54: 	 simple_register_monitor_and_unregister1/1,
   55: 	 simple_register_monitor_and_unregister2/1,
   56: 	 simple_register_monitor_and_unregister3/1,
   57: 	 register_monitor_and_crash1/1, 
   58: 	 register_monitor_and_crash2/1, 
   59: 	 register_monitor_and_crash3/1, 
   60: 	 register_monitor_and_crash4/1, 
   61: 	 register_monitor_and_crash5/1,

   63: 	 register_monitor_request_and_crash2/1,

   66:

   69: 
   70: 	]).

   89: 
   90: %%======================================================================
   91: %% Common Test interface functions
   92: %%======================================================================
   93: 
   94: suite() -> 
   95:     [{ct_hooks, [ts_install_cth]}].
   96: 
   97: 
   98: all() -> 
   99:     [
  100:      {group, register_user},
  101:      {group, tickets}
  102:     ].
  103: 
  104: groups() -> 
  105:     [
  106:      {register_user, [], register_user_cases()},
  107:      {tickets,       [], tickets_cases()}
  108:     ].
  109: 
  110: register_user_cases() ->
  111:     [
  112:      simple_register_and_unregister1,
  113:      simple_register_and_unregister2,
  114:      simple_register_and_unregister3, register_and_crash1,
  115:      register_and_crash2, register_and_crash3,
  116:      register_request_and_crash1,
  117:      register_request_and_crash2,
  118:      register_request_and_crash3,
  119:      simple_register_monitor_and_unregister1,
  120:      simple_register_monitor_and_unregister2,
  121:      simple_register_monitor_and_unregister3,
  122:      register_monitor_and_crash1,
  123:      register_monitor_and_crash2,
  124:      register_monitor_and_crash3,
  125:      register_monitor_and_crash4,
  126:      register_monitor_and_crash5,
  127:      register_monitor_request_and_crash1,
  128:      register_monitor_request_and_crash2,
  129:      register_monitor_request_and_crash3,
  130:      register_monitor_request_and_crash4
  131:     ].
  132: 
  133: tickets_cases() ->
  134:     [
  135:      otp7902
  136:     ].
  137: 
  138: 
  139: 
  140: %%
  141: %% -----
  142: %%
  143: 
  144: init_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
  145: 
  146:     ?IPRINT("init_per_suite -> entry with"
  147:             "~n   Config0: ~p", [Config0]),
  148: 
  149:     case ?LIB:init_per_suite(Config0) of
  150:         {skip, _} = SKIP ->
  151:             SKIP;
  152:         Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
  153:             snmp_test_sys_monitor:start(),
  154:             Config2 = snmp_test_lib:init_suite_top_dir(?MODULE, Config1), 
  155: 
  156:             ?IPRINT("init_per_suite -> done when"
  157:                     "~n   Config: ~p", [Config2]),
  158: 
  159:             Config2
  160:     end.
  161: 
  162: end_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  163: 
  164:     ?IPRINT("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  165:             "~n   Config: ~p", [Config]),
  166: 
  167:     snmp_test_sys_monitor:stop(),
  168:     Config1 = ?LIB:end_per_suite(Config),
  169: 
  170:     ?IPRINT("end_per_suite -> end"),
  171: 
  172:     Config1.
  173: 
  174: 
  175: 
  176: %%
  177: %% -----
  178: %%
  179: 
  180: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  181: 	Config.
  182: 
  183: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  184: 	Config.
  185: 
  186: 
  187: 
  188: %%
  189: %% -----
  190: %%
  191: 
  192: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  193:     ?IPRINT("init_per_testcase -> entry with"
  194:             "~n   Config: ~p", [Config]),
  195: 
  196:     snmp_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  197:     
  198:     ?IPRINT("init_per_testcase -> ensure (snmp) manager not running"),
  199:     Mod      = snmpm_supervisor,
  200:     Stopper = fun() -> Mod:stop() end,
  201:     ?ENSURE_NOT_RUNNING(Mod, Stopper, 1000),
  202: 
  203:     SuiteTopDir = ?config(snmp_suite_top_dir, Config),
  204:     CaseTopDir  = filename:join(SuiteTopDir, atom_to_list(Case)),
  205:     ok    = file:make_dir(CaseTopDir),
  206:     ?IPRINT("init_per_testcase -> CaseTopDir: ~p", [CaseTopDir]),
  207:     MgrTopDir   = filename:join(CaseTopDir, "manager/"),
  208:     ok    = file:make_dir(MgrTopDir),
  209:     MgrConfDir  = filename:join(MgrTopDir, "conf/"),
  210:     ok    = file:make_dir(MgrConfDir),
  211:     MgrDbDir    = filename:join(MgrTopDir, "db/"),
  212:     ok    = file:make_dir(MgrDbDir),
  213:     MgrLogDir   = filename:join(MgrTopDir,   "log/"),
  214:     ok    = file:make_dir(MgrLogDir),
  215: 
  216:     Config1 = [{case_top_dir,     CaseTopDir},
  217:                {manager_dir,      MgrTopDir},
  218:                {manager_conf_dir, MgrConfDir},
  219:                {manager_db_dir,   MgrDbDir},
  220:                {manager_log_dir,  MgrLogDir} | Config],
  221: 
  222:     ?IPRINT("init_per_testcase -> done when"
  223:             "~n   Config: ~p", [Config1]),
  224: 
  225:     Config1.
  226: 
  227: 
  228: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  229: 
  230:     ?IPRINT("end_per_testcase -> entry with"
  231:             "~n   Config: ~p",
  232:             [Config]),
  233: 
  234:     ?IPRINT("system events during test: ~p",
  235:             [snmp_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  236: 
  237:     Config.
  238: 
  239: 
  240: 
  241: %%======================================================================
  242: %% Test functions
  243: %%======================================================================
  244: 
  245: simple_register_and_unregister1(suite) -> [];
  246: simple_register_and_unregister1(doc) ->
  247:     "Start a user, register and unregister the user.";
  248: simple_register_and_unregister1(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  249:     put(tname,srar1),
  250:     ?IPRINT("start"),
  251:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  252: 
  253:     ConfDir = ?config(manager_conf_dir, Conf),
  254:     DbDir = ?config(manager_db_dir, Conf),
  255: 
  256:     write_manager_conf(ConfDir),
  257: 
  258:     Opts = [{server, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  259:             {net_if, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  260:             {note_store, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  261:             {config, [{verbosity, trace}, {dir, ConfDir}, {db_dir, DbDir}]}],
  262:  
  263:     ?IPRINT("try starting manager"),
  264:     ok = snmpm:start_link(Opts),
  265:  
  266:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  267: 
  268:     Id = make_ref(), 
  269: 
  270:     Pid = start_user(),
  271: 
  272:     [] = Users1 = which_users(),
  273:     ?IPRINT("Users1: ~p", [Users1]),
  274:     
  275:     ok = register_user(Pid, Id),
  276: 
  277:     [Id] = Users2 = which_users(),
  278:     ?IPRINT("Users2: ~p", [Users2]),
  279:     
  280:     ok = unregister_user(Pid),
  281: 
  282:     [] = Users3 = which_users(),
  283:     ?IPRINT("Users3: ~p", [Users3]),
  284:     
  285:     stop_user(Pid),
  286: 
  287:     ok = snmpm:stop(),
  288: 
  289:     ?IPRINT("end"),
  290:     ok.
  291: 
  292: 
  293: %% ------------------------------------------------------------------
  294: 
  295: simple_register_and_unregister2(suite) -> [];
  296: simple_register_and_unregister2(doc) ->
  297:     "Start a single user process, "
  298: 	"register 2 users (per that process) and unregister the 2 users.";
  299: simple_register_and_unregister2(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  300:     put(tname,srar2),
  301:     ?IPRINT("start"),
  302:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  303: 
  304:     ConfDir = ?config(manager_conf_dir, Conf),
  305:     DbDir = ?config(manager_db_dir, Conf),
  306: 
  307:     write_manager_conf(ConfDir),
  308: 
  309:     Opts = [{server, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  310:             {net_if, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  311:             {note_store, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  312:             {config, [{verbosity, trace}, {dir, ConfDir}, {db_dir, DbDir}]}],
  313:  
  314:     ?IPRINT("try starting manager"),
  315:     ok = snmpm:start_link(Opts),
  316:  
  317:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  318: 
  319:     Id1 = make_ref(), 
  320:     Id2 = make_ref(), 
  321: 
  322:     Pid = start_user(),
  323: 
  324:     [] = Users1 = which_users(),
  325:     ?IPRINT("Users1: ~p", [Users1]),
  326:     
  327:     ok = register_user(Pid, Id1),
  328:     ok = register_user(Pid, Id2),
  329: 
  330:     Users2 = case which_users() of
  331: 		       [Id1, Id2] = U1 ->
  332: 			   U1;
  333: 		       [Id2, Id1] = U2 ->
  334: 			   U2;
  335: 		       Else ->
  336: 			   ?FAIL({invalid_users, Else})
  337: 		   end,
  338:     ?IPRINT("Users2: ~p", [Users2]),
  339: 
  340:     
  341:     ok = unregister_user(Pid, Id1),
  342:     ok = unregister_user(Pid, Id2),
  343: 
  344:     [] = Users3 = which_users(),
  345:     ?IPRINT("Users3: ~p", [Users3]),
  346:     
  347:     stop_user(Pid),
  348: 
  349:     ok = snmpm:stop(),
  350: 
  351:     ?IPRINT("end"),
  352:     ok.
  353: 
  354: 
  355: %% ------------------------------------------------------------------
  356: 
  357: simple_register_and_unregister3(suite) -> [];
  358: simple_register_and_unregister3(doc) ->
  359:     "Start 2 user processes, "
  360: 	"register one users per process and unregister the 2 users.";
  361: simple_register_and_unregister3(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  362:     put(tname,srar2),
  363:     ?IPRINT("start"),
  364:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  365: 
  366:     ConfDir = ?config(manager_conf_dir, Conf),
  367:     DbDir = ?config(manager_db_dir, Conf),
  368: 
  369:     write_manager_conf(ConfDir),
  370: 
  371:     Opts = [{server, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  372:             {net_if, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  373:             {note_store, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  374:             {config, [{verbosity, trace}, {dir, ConfDir}, {db_dir, DbDir}]}],
  375:  
  376:     ?IPRINT("try starting manager"),
  377:     ok = snmpm:start_link(Opts),
  378:  
  379:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  380: 
  381:     Id1 = make_ref(), 
  382:     Id2 = make_ref(), 
  383: 
  384:     Pid1 = start_user(),
  385:     Pid2 = start_user(),
  386: 
  387:     [] = Users1 = which_users(),
  388:     ?IPRINT("Users1: ~p", [Users1]),
  389:     
  390:     ok = register_user(Pid1, Id1),
  391:     ok = register_user(Pid2, Id2),
  392: 
  393:     Users2 = case which_users() of
  394: 		       [Id1, Id2] = U1 ->
  395: 			   U1;
  396: 		       [Id2, Id1] = U2 ->
  397: 			   U2;
  398: 		       Else ->
  399: 			   ?FAIL({invalid_users, Else})
  400: 		   end,
  401:     ?IPRINT("Users2: ~p", [Users2]),
  402: 
  403:     
  404:     ok = unregister_user(Pid1, Id1),
  405:     ok = unregister_user(Pid2, Id2),
  406: 
  407:     [] = Users3 = which_users(),
  408:     ?IPRINT("Users3: ~p", [Users3]),
  409:     
  410:     stop_user(Pid1),
  411:     stop_user(Pid2),
  412: 
  413:     ok = snmpm:stop(),
  414: 
  415:     ?IPRINT("end"),
  416:     ok.
  417: 
  418: 
  419: %% ------------------------------------------------------------------
  420: 
  421: register_and_crash1(suite) -> [];
  422: register_and_crash1(doc) ->
  423:     "Start a user, register and crash user.";
  424: register_and_crash1(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  425:     put(tname,racau1),
  426:     ?IPRINT("start"),
  427:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  428: 
  429:     ConfDir = ?config(manager_conf_dir, Conf),
  430:     DbDir = ?config(manager_db_dir, Conf),
  431: 
  432:     write_manager_conf(ConfDir),
  433: 
  434:     Opts = [{server, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  435:             {net_if, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  436:             {note_store, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  437:             {config, [{verbosity, trace}, {dir, ConfDir}, {db_dir, DbDir}]}],
  438:  
  439:     ?IPRINT("try starting manager"),
  440:     ok = snmpm:start_link(Opts),
  441:  
  442:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  443: 
  444:     Id = make_ref(), 
  445: 
  446:     Pid = start_user(),
  447: 
  448:     [] = Users1 = which_users(),
  449:     ?IPRINT("Users1: ~p", [Users1]),
  450:     
  451:     ok = register_user(Pid, Id),
  452: 
  453:     [Id] = Users2 = which_users(),
  454:     ?IPRINT("Users2: ~p", [Users2]),
  455: 
  456:     ok = simulate_crash(Pid),
  457: 
  458:     [Id] = Users3 = which_users(),
  459:     ?IPRINT("Users3: ~p", [Users3]),
  460:     
  461:     ?IPRINT("stop manager"),
  462:     ok = snmpm:stop(),
  463: 
  464:     ?IPRINT("end"),
  465:     ok.
  466: 
  467: 
  468: %% ------------------------------------------------------------------
  469: 
  470: register_and_crash2(suite) -> [];
  471: register_and_crash2(doc) ->
  472:     "Start a single user process, "
  473: 	"register 2 users (per that process) and crash the process.";
  474: register_and_crash2(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  475:     put(tname,racau2),
  476:     ?IPRINT("start"),
  477:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  478: 
  479:     ConfDir = ?config(manager_conf_dir, Conf),
  480:     DbDir = ?config(manager_db_dir, Conf),
  481: 
  482:     write_manager_conf(ConfDir),
  483: 
  484:     Opts = [{server, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  485:             {net_if, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  486:             {note_store, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  487:             {config, [{verbosity, trace}, {dir, ConfDir}, {db_dir, DbDir}]}],
  488:  
  489:     ?IPRINT("try starting manager"),
  490:     ok = snmpm:start_link(Opts),
  491:  
  492:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  493: 
  494:     Id1 = make_ref(), 
  495:     Id2 = make_ref(), 
  496: 
  497:     Pid = start_user(),
  498: 
  499:     [] = Users1 = which_users(),
  500:     ?IPRINT("Users1: ~p", [Users1]),
  501:     
  502:     ok = register_user(Pid, Id1),
  503:     ok = register_user(Pid, Id2),
  504: 
  505:     Users2 = case which_users() of
  506: 		       [Id1, Id2] = U1 ->
  507: 			   U1;
  508: 		       [Id2, Id1] = U2 ->
  509: 			   U2;
  510: 		       Else1 ->
  511: 			   ?FAIL({invalid_users, Else1})
  512: 		   end,
  513:     ?IPRINT("Users2: ~p", [Users2]),
  514: 
  515:     ok = simulate_crash(Pid),
  516: 
  517:     Users3 = case which_users() of
  518: 		       [Id1, Id2] = U3 ->
  519: 			   U3;
  520: 		       [Id2, Id1] = U4 ->
  521: 			   U4;
  522: 		       Else2 ->
  523: 			   ?FAIL({invalid_users, Else2})
  524: 		   end,
  525:     ?IPRINT("Users3: ~p", [Users3]),
  526:     
  527:     ?IPRINT("stop manager"),
  528:     ok = snmpm:stop(),
  529: 
  530:     ?IPRINT("end"),
  531:     ok.
  532: 
  533:

  535:

  545:     ?SKIP(not_yet_implemented).
  546:

  565:     "Start a single user process, "
  566: 	"register 2 users (per that single user process), "
  567: 	"send a request for each user and crash the single user process.";
  568: register_request_and_crash2(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  569:     %%     put(tname,rrac2),
  570:     %%     ?IPRINT("start"),
  571:     %%     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  572:     ?SKIP(not_yet_implemented).
  573: 
  574: 
  575: %% ------------------------------------------------------------------
  576: 
  577: register_request_and_crash3(suite) -> [];
  578: register_request_and_crash3(doc) ->
  579:     "Start 2 user processes, "
  580: 	"register one user per process, "
  581: 	"send a request for each user and crash the first user process.";
  582: register_request_and_crash3(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  583:     %%     put(tname,rrac3),
  584:     %%     ?IPRINT("start"),
  585:     %%     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  586:     ?SKIP(not_yet_implemented).
  587:

  589: %% ------------------------------------------------------------------
  590: 
  591: simple_register_monitor_and_unregister1(suite) -> [];
  592: simple_register_monitor_and_unregister1(doc) ->
  593:     "Start a user, register-link and unregister the user.";
  594: simple_register_monitor_and_unregister1(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  595:     put(tname,srlau1),
  596:     ?IPRINT("start"),
  597:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  598: 
  599:     ConfDir = ?config(manager_conf_dir, Conf),
  600:     DbDir = ?config(manager_db_dir, Conf),
  601: 
  602:     write_manager_conf(ConfDir),
  603: 
  604:     Opts = [{server, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  605:             {net_if, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  606:             {note_store, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  607:             {config, [{verbosity, trace}, {dir, ConfDir}, {db_dir, DbDir}]}],
  608:  
  609:     ?IPRINT("try starting manager"),
  610:     ok = snmpm:start_link(Opts),
  611:  
  612:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  613: 
  614:     Id = make_ref(), 
  615: 
  616:     ?IPRINT("start user"),
  617:     Pid = start_user(),
  618: 
  619:     ?IPRINT("get users (=0)"),
  620:     [] = Users1 = which_users(),
  621:     ?IPRINT("Users1: ~p", [Users1]),
  622:     
  623:     ?IPRINT("register monitored user"),
  624:     ok = register_user_monitor(Pid, Id),
  625: 
  626:     ?IPRINT("get users (=1)"),
  627:     [Id] = Users2 = which_users(),
  628:     ?IPRINT("Users2: ~p", [Users2]),
  629:     
  630:     ?IPRINT("unregister monitored user"),
  631:     unregister_user(Pid),
  632: 
  633:     ?IPRINT("get users (=0)"),
  634:     [] = Users3 = which_users(),
  635:     ?IPRINT("Users3: ~p", [Users3]),
  636:     
  637:     ?IPRINT("start user"),
  638:     stop_user(Pid),
  639: 
  640:     ?IPRINT("stop manager"),
  641:     ok = snmpm:stop(),
  642: 
  643:     ?IPRINT("end"),
  644:     ok.
  645: 
  646: 
  647: %% ------------------------------------------------------------------
  648: 
  649: simple_register_monitor_and_unregister2(suite) -> [];
  650: simple_register_monitor_and_unregister2(doc) ->
  651:     "Start a single user process, "
  652: 	"register-link 2 users (per that process) and "
  653: 	"unregister the 2 users.";
  654: simple_register_monitor_and_unregister2(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  655:     put(tname,srlau2),
  656:     ?IPRINT("start"),
  657:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  658: 
  659:     ConfDir = ?config(manager_conf_dir, Conf),
  660:     DbDir = ?config(manager_db_dir, Conf),
  661: 
  662:     write_manager_conf(ConfDir),
  663: 
  664:     Opts = [{server, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  665:             {net_if, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  666:             {note_store, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  667:             {config, [{verbosity, trace}, {dir, ConfDir}, {db_dir, DbDir}]}],
  668:  
  669:     ?IPRINT("try starting manager"),
  670:     ok = snmpm:start_link(Opts),
  671:  
  672:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  673: 
  674:     Id1 = make_ref(), 
  675:     Id2 = make_ref(), 
  676: 
  677:     Pid = start_user(),
  678: 
  679:     [] = Users1 = which_users(),
  680:     ?IPRINT("Users1: ~p", [Users1]),
  681:     
  682:     ok = register_user_monitor(Pid, Id1),
  683:     ok = register_user_monitor(Pid, Id2),
  684: 
  685:     Users2 = case which_users() of
  686: 		       [Id1, Id2] = U1 ->
  687: 			   U1;
  688: 		       [Id2, Id1] = U2 ->
  689: 			   U2;
  690: 		       Else ->
  691: 			   ?FAIL({invalid_users, Else})
  692: 		   end,
  693:     ?IPRINT("Users2: ~p", [Users2]),
  694:     
  695:     ok = unregister_user(Pid, Id1),
  696:     ok = unregister_user(Pid, Id2),
  697: 
  698:     [] = Users3 = which_users(),
  699:     ?IPRINT("Users3: ~p", [Users3]),
  700:     
  701:     stop_user(Pid),
  702: 
  703:     ok = snmpm:stop(),
  704: 
  705:     ?IPRINT("end"),
  706:     ok.
  707: 
  708: 
  709: %% ------------------------------------------------------------------
  710:

  728:             {net_if, [{verbosity, trace}]},

  730:             {config, [{verbosity, trace}, {dir, ConfDir}, {db_dir, DbDir}]}],
  731:  
  732:     ?IPRINT("try starting manager"),
  733:     ok = snmpm:start_link(Opts),
  734:

  738:     Id2 = make_ref(), 
  739:

  744:

  746:     ok = register_user_monitor(Pid, Id2),
  747: 
  748:     Users2 = case which_users() of
  749: 		       [Id1, Id2] = U1 ->
  750: 			   U1;
  751: 		       [Id2, Id1] = U2 ->
  752: 			   U2;
  753: 		       Else ->
  754: 			   ?FAIL({invalid_users, Else})
  755: 		   end,
  756:     ?IPRINT("Users2: ~p", [Users2]),
  757:     
  758:     unregister_user(Pid),
  759: 
  760:     [] = Users3 = which_users(),
  761:     ?IPRINT("Users3: ~p", [Users3]),
  762:     
  763:     stop_user(Pid),
  764: 
  765:     ok = snmpm:stop(),
  766: 
  767:     ?IPRINT("end"),
  768:     ok.

  773: register_monitor_and_crash1(suite) -> [];

  775:     "Start a user, register-monitor and crash the user.";
  776: register_monitor_and_crash1(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  777:     put(tname,rlac1),
  778:     ?IPRINT("start"),
  779:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  780: 
  781:     ConfDir = ?config(manager_conf_dir, Conf),
  782:     DbDir = ?config(manager_db_dir, Conf),
  783: 
  784:     write_manager_conf(ConfDir),
  785: 
  786:     Opts = [{server, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  787:             {net_if, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  788:             {note_store, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  789:             {config, [{verbosity, trace}, {dir, ConfDir}, {db_dir, DbDir}]}],
  790:  
  791:     ?IPRINT("try starting manager"),
  792:     ok = snmpm:start_link(Opts),
  793:  
  794:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  795: 
  796:     Id = make_ref(), 
  797: 
  798:     Pid = start_user(),
  799: 
  800:     [] = Users1 = which_users(),
  801:     ?IPRINT("Users1: ~p", [Users1]),
  802:     
  803:     ok = register_user_monitor(Pid, Id),
  804: 
  805:     [Id] = Users2 = which_users(),
  806:     ?IPRINT("Users2: ~p", [Users2]),
  807: 
  808:     ok = simulate_crash(Pid),
  809: 
  810:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  811: 
  812:     [] = Users3 = which_users(),
  813:     ?IPRINT("Users3: ~p", [Users3]),
  814:     
  815:     ?IPRINT("stop manager"),
  816:     ok = snmpm:stop(),
  817: 
  818:     ?IPRINT("end"),
  819:     ok.

  826:     "Start a single user process, "

  838: 
  839:     Opts = [{server, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  840:             {net_if, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  841:             {note_store, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  842:             {config, [{verbosity, trace}, {dir, ConfDir}, {db_dir, DbDir}]}],
  843:  
  844:     ?IPRINT("try starting manager"),
  845:     ok = snmpm:start_link(Opts),
  846:

  859:

  861: 		       [Id1, Id2] = U1 ->
  862: 			   U1;
  863: 		       [Id2, Id1] = U2 ->
  864: 			   U2;
  865: 		       Else ->
  866: 			   ?FAIL({invalid_users, Else})
  867: 		   end,

  878:     ok = snmpm:stop(),
  879: 
  880:     ?IPRINT("end"),
  881:     ok.

  884: %% ------------------------------------------------------------------
  885: 
  886: register_monitor_and_crash3(suite) -> [];
  887: register_monitor_and_crash3(doc) ->
  888:     "Start a single user process, "
  889: 	"register-monitor one user and register one user, "
  890: 	"crash the single user process.";
  891: register_monitor_and_crash3(Conf) when is_list(Conf) -> 
  892:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  893:     put(tname,rlac3),
  894: 
  895:     %% <CONDITIONAL-SKIP>
  896:     LinuxVersionVerify = 
  897: 	fun() ->
  898:                 case os:version() of
  899:                     V when V > {2, 6, 16} ->
  900:                         ?IPRINT("(Linux) kernel version check: "
  901:                                 "~p > {2, 6, 16} => *NO* SKIP", [V]),
  902:                         false;
  903:                     V ->
  904:                         ?IPRINT("(Linux) kernel version check: "
  905:                                 "~p =< {2, 6, 16}  => *SKIP*", [V]),
  906:                         true
  907: 		end
  908: 	end,
  909:     Skippable = [{unix, [{linux, LinuxVersionVerify}]}],
  910:     Condition = fun() -> ?OS_BASED_SKIP(Skippable) end,
  911:     ?NON_PC_TC_MAYBE_SKIP(Conf, Condition),
  912:     %% </CONDITIONAL-SKIP>
  913: 
  914:     ?IPRINT("start"),
  915: 
  916:     ConfDir = ?config(manager_conf_dir, Conf),
  917:     DbDir = ?config(manager_db_dir, Conf),
  918: 
  919:     write_manager_conf(ConfDir),
  920: 
  921:     Opts = [{server,     [{verbosity, trace}]},
  922:             {net_if,     [{verbosity, trace}]},
  923:             {note_store, [{verbosity, trace}]},
  924:             {config,     [{verbosity, trace}, {dir, ConfDir}, {db_dir, DbDir}]}],
  925:  
  926:     ?IPRINT("try starting manager"),
  927:     ok = snmpm:start_link(Opts),
  928:  
  929:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  930: 
  931:     Id1 = make_ref(), 
  932:     Id2 = make_ref(), 
  933: 
  934:     Pid = start_user(),
  935: 
  936:     [] = Users1 = which_users(),
  937:     ?IPRINT("Users1: ~p", [Users1]),
  938:     
  939:     ok = register_user(Pid, Id1),
  940:     ok = register_user_monitor(Pid, Id2),
  941: 
  942:     Users2 = case which_users() of
  943: 		       [Id1, Id2] = U1 ->
  944: 			   U1;
  945: 		       [Id2, Id1] = U2 ->
  946: 			   U2;
  947: 		       Else ->
  948: 			   ?FAIL({invalid_users, Else})
  949: 		   end,
  950:     ?IPRINT("Users2: ~p", [Users2]),
  951: 
  952:     ok = simulate_crash(Pid),
  953: 
  954:     ?SLEEP(1000),
  955: 
  956:     [Id1] = Users3 = which_users(),
  957:     ?IPRINT("Users3: ~p", [Users3]),
  958:     
  959:     ?IPRINT("stop manager"),
  960:     ok = snmpm:stop(),
  961: 
  962:     ?IPRINT("end"),
  963:     ok.
  964: 
  965: 
  966: %% ------------------------------------------------------------------

 1034: register_monitor_and_crash5(suite) -> [];
 1035: register_monitor_and_crash5(doc) ->
 1036:     "OTP-7961: "
 1037: 	"Start 2 user processes, "
 1038: 	"register-monitor a user for per process, "
 1039: 	"let each user register an agent "
 1040: 	"and crash the first user process.";
 1041: register_monitor_and_crash5(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1042:     put(tname,rlac4),
 1043:     ?IPRINT("start"),
 1044:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1045: 
 1046:     ConfDir = ?config(manager_conf_dir, Conf),
 1047:     DbDir = ?config(manager_db_dir, Conf),
 1048: 
 1049:     write_manager_conf(ConfDir),
 1050: 
 1051:     Opts = [{server, [{verbosity, trace}]},
 1052:             {net_if, [{verbosity, trace}]},
 1053:             {note_store, [{verbosity, trace}]},
 1054:             {config, [{verbosity, trace}, {dir, ConfDir}, {db_dir, DbDir}]}],
 1055:  
 1056:     ?IPRINT("start manager"),
 1057:     ok = snmpm:start_link(Opts),
 1058:  
 1059:     ?SLEEP(1000),
 1060: 
 1061:     Id1 = gurka, %% make_ref(), 
 1062:     Id2 = tomat, %% make_ref(), 
 1063: 
 1064:     ?IPRINT("start user processes"),
 1065:     Pid1 = start_user(),
 1066:     Pid2 = start_user(),
 1067: 
 1068:     [] = Users1 = which_users(),
 1069:     ?IPRINT("Users1: ~p", [Users1]),
 1070:     
 1071:     ok = register_user_monitor(Pid1, Id1),
 1072:     ok = register_user_monitor(Pid2, Id2),
 1073: 
 1074:     LocalHost = snmp_test_lib:localhost(),
 1075: 
 1076:     TargetName1 = "kalle1",
 1077:     Address1    = LocalHost,
 1078:     Port1       = 5001,
 1079:     EngineId1   = "agentEngineId-1",
 1080: 
 1081:     TargetName2 = "kalle2",
 1082:     Address2 = LocalHost,
 1083:     Port2       = 5002,
 1084:     EngineId2   = "agentEngineId-2",
 1085: 
 1086:     ok = register_agent(Pid1,
 1087: 			      Id1, TargetName1, [{address,   Address1},
 1088: 						 {port,      Port1},
 1089: 						 {engine_id, EngineId1}]),
 1090:     ok = register_agent(Pid2,
 1091: 			      Id2, TargetName2, [{address,   Address2},
 1092: 						 {port,      Port2},
 1093: 						 {engine_id, EngineId2}]),
 1094: 
 1095:     Users2 = case which_users() of
 1096: 		       [Id1, Id2] = U1 ->
 1097: 			   U1;
 1098: 		       [Id2, Id1] = U2 ->
 1099: 			   U2;
 1100: 		       U3 ->
 1101: 			   ?FAIL({invalid_users, U3})
 1102: 		   end,
 1103:     ?IPRINT("Users2: ~p", [Users2]),
 1104: 
 1105:     ?IPRINT("verify all agent(s): expect 2"),
 1106:     Agents1 = case which_agents() of
 1107: 			[TargetName1, TargetName2] = A1 ->
 1108: 			    A1;
 1109: 			[TargetName2, TargetName1] = A2 ->
 1110: 			    A2;
 1111: 		       A3 ->
 1112: 			   ?FAIL({invalid_agents, A3})
 1113: 		   end,
 1114:     ?IPRINT("Agents1: ~p", [Agents1]),
 1115: 
 1116:     ok = simulate_crash(Pid1),
 1117: 
 1118:     ?IPRINT("wait some time"),
 1119:     ?SLEEP(1000),
 1120: 
 1121:     [Id2] = Users3 = which_users(),
 1122:     ?IPRINT("Users3: ~p", [Users3]),
 1123:     
 1124:     [TargetName2] = Agents2 = which_agents(),
 1125:     ?IPRINT("Agents2: ~p", [Agents2]),
 1126:     
 1127:     stop_user(Pid2),
 1128: 
 1129:     ?IPRINT("stop manager"),
 1130:     ok = snmpm:stop(),
 1131: 
 1132:     ?IPRINT("end"),
 1133:     ok.
 1134:

 1197: otp7902(suite) -> [];

 1206:     DbDir = ?config(manager_db_dir, Conf),

 1211:             {net_if, [{verbosity, trace}]},

 1213:             {config, [{verbosity, trace}, {dir, ConfDir}, {db_dir, DbDir}]}],

 1237: 
 1238: 
 1239: %% ------------------------------------------------------------------
 1240: 
 1241: start_user() ->
 1242:     {ok, Pid} = snmp_manager_user_test_lib:start_link(),
 1243:     Pid.
 1244: 
 1245: stop_user(Pid) ->
 1246:     snmp_manager_user_test_lib:stop(Pid).
 1247: 
 1248: simulate_crash(Pid) ->
 1249:     snmp_manager_user_test_lib:simulate_crash(Pid, simulate_crash),
 1250:     receive
 1251: 	{'EXIT', Pid, simulate_crash} ->
 1252: 	    ok;
 1253: 	{'EXIT', Pid, Whatever} ->
 1254: 	    {ok, Whatever}
 1255:     after 5000 ->
 1256: 	    {error, timeout}
 1257:     end.
 1258: 
 1259: register_user(Pid, Id) ->
 1260:     snmp_manager_user_test_lib:register(Pid, Id).
 1261: 
 1262: register_user_monitor(Pid, Id) ->
 1263:     snmp_manager_user_test_lib:register_monitor(Pid, Id).
 1264: 
 1265: unregister_user(Pid) ->
 1266:     case snmp_manager_user_test_lib:unregister(Pid) of
 1267: 	{ok, Res} ->
 1268: 	    case [R || R <- Res, R =/= ok] of
 1269: 		[] ->
 1270: 		    ok;
 1271: 		Errs ->
 1272: 		    {error, Errs}
 1273: 	    end;
 1274: 	Error ->
 1275: 	    Error
 1276:     end.
 1277: 
 1278: unregister_user(Pid, Id) ->
 1279:     snmp_manager_user_test_lib:unregister(Pid, Id).
 1280: 
 1281: 
 1282: register_agent(Pid, Id, TargetName, Config) ->
 1283:     snmp_manager_user_test_lib:register_agent(Pid, Id, TargetName, Config).
 1284: 
 1285: 
 1286: %% ------
 1287: 
 1288: which_users() ->
 1289:     snmpm:which_users().
 1290: 
 1291: which_agents() ->
 1292:     snmpm:which_agents().
 1293: 
 1294: 
 1295: %% ------
 1296: 
 1297: 
 1298: write_manager_conf(Dir) ->
 1299:     Port = "0",
 1300:     MMS  = "484",
 1301:     EngineID = "\"mgrEngine\"",
 1302:     Str = lists:flatten(
 1303:             io_lib:format("%% Minimum manager config file\n"
 1304:                           "{port,             ~s}.\n"
 1305:                           "{max_message_size, ~s}.\n"
 1306:                           "{engine_id,        ~s}.\n",
 1307:                           [Port, MMS, EngineID])),
 1308:     write_manager_conf(Dir, Str).
 1309: 
 1310: write_manager_conf(Dir, Str) ->
 1311:     write_conf_file(Dir, "manager.conf", Str).
 1312: 
 1313: 
 1314: write_conf_file(Dir, File, Str) ->
 1315:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(filename:join(Dir, File), write),
 1316:     ok = io:format(Fd, "~s", [Str]),
 1317:     file:close(Fd).
 1318:
